abstract: A 70 percent stake in Nedbank is currently valued at about $6.4 billion.
snippet: A 70 percent stake in Nedbank is currently valued at about $6.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: HSBC, the international bank, said Monday that it was in exclusive talks with the African insurer Old Mutual to buy a controlling stake in the South African lender Nedbank, as it aimed to strengthen its presence on a continent that was one of China’s major trading partners.

headline.main: HSBC Seeks to Acquire Major Stake in Nedbank
headline.print_headline: HSBC Seeks To Acquire Major Stake In Nedbank
